Humans have been eating noodles for over 2000 years - this food is time tested! ​Today more than 2 billion people across the world eat fresh noodles every day.

way
It is scientifically proven stir-frying is the healthiest way of cooking, and there is only one way to cook fast and at the same time healthy – stir-frying in the wok.
